      private SpecialClause checkForConflict(StorySentence storySentence)
      Returns a SpecialClause object if a concept is identified as a conflict within the StorySentence that is below or equal to the minimum conflict polarity requirement and has less polarity than the previous conflict identified, if possible.

      Returns a SpecialClause object if a concept within the story sentence is the resolution for the identified conflict concept.

    • Method Detail

      • checkForConflict

        private SpecialClause checkForConflict(StorySentence storySentence)
        Returns a SpecialClause object if a concept is identified as a conflict within the StorySentence that is below or equal to the minimum conflict polarity requirement and has less polarity than the previous conflict identified, if possible.
        Parameters:
        storySentence - Story sentence to check conflict from
        Returns:
        SpecialClause object if a concept is identified as a conflict, else null

      • checkForResolution

        private SpecialClause checkForResolution(StorySentence storySentence)
        Returns a SpecialClause object if a concept within the story sentence is the resolution for the identified conflict concept.
        Parameters:
        storySentence - Story sentence to check resolution from
        Returns:
        a SpecialClause object if a concept within the story sentence is the resolution for the identified conflict concept, else null

      • hasValidResolutionConcept

        private boolean hasValidResolutionConcept(SpecialClause conflict,
                                          Clause resolutionClause)
        Returns true if the resolutionClause is passes the rule to be a resolution for the conflict.
        Parameters:
        conflict - The Conflict clause to use
        resolutionClause - Probable resolution clause to check from
        Returns:
        Returns true if the resolutionClause is passes the rule to be a resolution for the conflict.

      • processInput

        public void processInput(java.lang.String text)
        Extracts information from the input text and puts it in the Abstract Story Representation
        Parameters:
        text - the text input to use
